# Making a new Location 'Open' on Launcher

## Your location has completed all their tasks and you are ready to make them an active location.

### ðŸŽ‰Â Launching a New Location ðŸŽ‰

Once all tasks at the location have been completed, you will notice that it is now ready to go live and will appear on your Dashboard as such:

![Screenshot 2024-04-22 at 4.20.12 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.20.12%20PM.png?width=387&height=210&name=Screenshot%202024-04-22%20at%204.20.12%20PM.png)

To launch this location, simply select the blue button 'Make live'!

![Screenshot 2024-04-23 at 10.24.02 AM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-23%20at%2010.24.02%20AM.png?width=537&height=382&name=Screenshot%202024-04-23%20at%2010.24.02%20AM.png)

![Screenshot 2024-04-23 at 10.24.16 AM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-23%20at%2010.24.16%20AM.png?width=544&height=365&name=Screenshot%202024-04-23%20at%2010.24.16%20AM.png)

###### Was this article helpful?    YesNo
